    • Method Detail

      • generateKeys

        public static java.security.KeyPair generateKeys()
                                          throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Returns:
        Asymmetric KeyPair used for RSA encryption/decryption
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if someone messed with the code and changed the algorithm to one that is invalid

      • encrypt

        public static java.lang.String[] encrypt​(java.lang.String input,
                                         java.security.PublicKey key,
                                         javax.crypto.spec.GCMParameterSpec gcmParamSpec,
                                         byte[] aadData)
        Attempts to encrypt the string using both symmetric and asymmetric techniques
        Parameters:
        input - String input that is to be encrypted
        key - PublicKey used for asymmetric encryption
        gcmParamSpec - GCM Parameter Specifications used for the encryption
        aadData - extra data tag to be included within the final encryption
        Returns:
        String array of [ asymmetrically encrypted symmetric encryption key , symmetrically encrypted data ]

      • decrypt

        public static java.lang.String decrypt​(EncryptionPacket packet,
                                       java.security.PrivateKey key,
                                       byte[] aadData)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Attempts to decrypt the string using both symmetric and asymmetric techniques
        Parameters:
        packet - EncryptionPacket that contains the encrypted data
        key - PrivateKey used for the asymmetric decryption
        aadData - the extra data tag used during the encryption
        Returns:
        the original decrypted String
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
